unnormalised: Hey guys, any updates on Dhawan's shoulder? Last I heard he was undergoing treatment at the NCA after that nasty fall. Hope he's back soon! We need him for the upcoming series. Recovery is key. Get well soon, paaji! Reminds me of the scene in Chak De! India where the player's injured. Let's hope it's not a serious one!
normalised: Hey guys, any updates on Dhawan's shoulder? Last I heard he was undergoing treatment at the N C A after that nasty fall. Hope he's back soon! We need him for the upcoming series.
